thread.title: BSNL's new Rs 339 plan offers unlimited on-net calls and 2GB data per day
thread.title_full: BSNL's new Rs 339 plan offers unlimited on-net calls and 2GB data per day

title: BSNL's new Rs 339 plan offers unlimited on-net calls and 2GB data per day
text:
BSNL’s new Rs 339 plan offers unlimited on-net calls and 2GB data... BSNL’s new Rs 339 plan offers unlimited on-net calls and 2GB data per day By - March 16, 2017 “There’s also an Rs 99 plan with unlimited BSNL to BSNL calls and 500MB of data per day for 28 days” 
BSNL introduced two new Rs 99 and Rs 339 packs with unlimited calling and data benefits last December to compete against Reliance Jio. Now the company has re-launched the earlier plans with slightly revised data and calling benefits. 
BSNL’s new Rs 99 plan for prepaid users now offers unlimited BSNL to BSNL local and STD calls everyday for 28 days and 500MB of 3G data. This plan’s price varies from Rs 99 to Rs 149, depending on the circle. 
The revised Rs 339 plan now offers unlimited local / STD BSNL to BSNL calls and 2GB of 3G data per day for 28 days. This plan also gives you 25 minutes of voice calls every day on other telecom operators. After 2GB of data has been consumed, the speed will drop to 80kbps. 
While BSNL’s new Rs 99 plan is available in select telecom circles, the Rs 339 pack is available across the country.
